name: The Legend of Bo
description:
Help Jim Bo on his quest to get revenge on his neighborhood bully and his goons! Experience as much pain, adventure, romance, and turmoil as a ten-year-old can handle! Will you find everything that this small town has to offer?

Created with public domain art and music assets from: opengameart.org and kenney.nl.

Title music: Tittle Screen by sawsquarenoise

Boss music: Boss Theme by sawsquarenoise 

Death music: Boss Splash by sawsquarenoise

Overworld theme: Daphne Dumpling by Origami Repetika

End music: Never-Give-Up by Ketsa
